rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel init.code & check.format, set select fields for code
update start panel, update log file name
Modification made for CenterPoint Request 37109 Task 32931.
1) The signatures for the Italian formats were not being picked up.
2) Spanish was added as a language in SC6.1.
To correct this, the first line on panel start.code.loop was changed

$L.send.sql="object.type = \"format\" and (object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"en\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"de\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"fr\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"ja\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"itil\")"

$L.send.sql="object.type = \"format\" and (object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"en\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"de\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"fr\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"ja\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"itil\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"it\" or object.name=\""+name in $L.file+"es\")"

descript.descript: update panel init.code & check.format, set select fields for code
update start panel, update log file name
